Package Boundary

Class GuestUI

java.lang.Object
Boundary.UserUI
Boundary.MovieGoerUI
Boundary.GuestUI
public class GuestUI extends MovieGoerUI
This Class represents the UI interface for Guests. It extends the MovieGoerUI class. Guests are allowed to perform most actions that authenticated MovieGoers can. Upon booking a ticket, our application will prompt users to sign up. This Class contains 2 key methods: showSelections and showUI to display the list of actions available for Guests and to handle inputs.

  • Method Details

    • showSelections

      public void showSelections()
      Description copied from class: MovieGoerUI
      Implementation of abstract method in UserUI. Displays the list of possible actions to the current authenticated movieGoer. This method should be called repeatedly in the main While loop with each iteration.
      Overrides:
      showSelections in class MovieGoerUI

    • showUI

      public void showUI(Scanner sc)
      Description copied from class: MovieGoerUI
      Implementation of abstract method in UserUI. This method operates in sync with the showSelections method above to accept input from the current authenticated movieGoer.
      Overrides:
      showUI in class MovieGoerUI
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner object to allow movieGoers to make their selections.
